thread.section_title: DIGIPRINT SUPPLIES Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van DIGIPRINT SUPPLIES | www.digiprint-supplies.com
thread.title: Kate

author: Kate
title: Kate
text:
I recently had one of my printers down and needed some parts which were difficult to find because my printer was very old. DIGIPRINT SUPPLIES did their very best to help me, and gave me alternatives for my problem, proactively. Everything is back on track now.
I've been using them for a few times already and I am amazed by the constancy of their great customer service and their technical knowledge. They definitely deserve these 5 stars!
